author: sgala
msg: partial fix (only works when the servlet container believes it is serving ports 80 and 443) for the problem about secure URLs in http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JS2-275 . This is the patch I posted there.

author: trygvis
msg: o Updating to the latest Plexus compiler API.

author: clr
msg: Made construct(String, String) static; fixed synchronization bug in addStringConstructor

author: sgala
msg: A small change with big usability implications. Just swapped the two big ifs in the creation of DecorationActions, now the WindowState ones always come last, which make the portlet title bar far more predictable.

author: jgallacher
msg: request_tp_clear() is called in request_tp_dealloc() before it was
defined, which causes a gcc 4.0.1 compliation error. GCC 3.3 only
generated a warning so this bug was not previously noticed.
